s1.message: Updated findbar icons to match Firefox 2.0 theme

s2.message: Fixed English strings in Danish and Traditional Chinese translations

s3.message: K-Meleon: Added context menu to the toolbar icon

s4.message: Songbird: Added Adblock Plus menu item to the Files menu

s5.message: Songbird: Added Adblock Plus icon to the status bar

s6.message: SeaMonkey: Extension registers automatically, only need to copy the files to install (instructions)

s7.message: Fixed: "Open Link in New Tab" stopped working in SeaMonkey Mail (bug 15536)

s8.message: Fixed: Ads not blocked in newsgroup posts (forum thread)

s9.message: Fixed: Should not offer whitelisting options for about:blank

s10.message: Fixed: Status bar icon always displayed as the most right icon, cannot be moved with Organize Status Bar

s11.message: Probably fixed: Enter/Tab keys sometimes trigger Adblock Plus actions (bug 15492)
